rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0001
rows.name: What...the...hell...happened...here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0002
rows.name:
You don't think...that one cinicula
could have killed all these simius?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0003
rows.name: Unless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0004
rows.name: Unless...what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0005
rows.name: This is bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0006
rows.name: What's bad? I don't follow you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0007
rows.name: That cinicula. It's a tyrant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0008
rows.name: Huh?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0009
rows.name: But...it...looks just like any other cinicula?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0010
rows.name:
Think about it: your typical simius is way higher up
on the food chain than your typical cinicula, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0011
rows.name:
Usually, we'd find one simius standing over three or four
cinicula corpses. But here, the tables have been turned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0012
rows.name:
And I don't see a single trace
of any other indigens in the area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0013
rows.name: There's only one explanation: that cinicula is a tyrant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0014
rows.name: Let me check the BLADE report database.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0015
rows.name:
If there's a tyrant this close to the city,
SOMEONE must have run across it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0016
rows.name: Bingo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0017
rows.name:
There was a cinicula tyrant sighted not too long ago—
but it was a couple of segments further out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0018
rows.name:
It could've followed the BLADE that spotted it back towards
New LA, or come here to feed, or who knows what. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0019
rows.name:
That's crazy. I can't believe there's a tyrant right on our
doorstep and HQ isn't doing a thing about it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0020
rows.name: Well, don't forget why they sent us here in the first place—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0021
rows.name: FrontierNav's range is still limited.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0022
rows.name: Oh, right—they couldn't track it if there's no local probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0023
rows.name: They must've lost it when it went off the grid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0010
rows.name: Attack

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest killing the tyrant.

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what a tyrant is.

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0024
rows.name: Whoa whoa whoooa there, rookie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0025
rows.name:
We're talking about a tyrant here!
Do you even understand what that means?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0026
rows.name: We should probably explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0027
rows.name:
"Tyrant" is our term for any indigenous lifeform
that falls outside of our usual threat ranking system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0028
rows.name:
In other words, they're too powerful for us to even
measure how dangerous they would be to take on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0029
rows.name: And "too powerful" doesn't always just mean physically strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0030
rows.name:
If a creature has even a single especially nasty trait,
it's classified as a tyrant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0031
rows.name: The "tyrant" designation[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0032
rows.name:
is given to creatures that pose a special threat in one way
or another. That doesn't always mean raw strength—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0033
rows.name:
some tyrants will actually register as low-rank when
you find them out in the field and engage them in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0034
rows.name: But don't let that fool you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0035
rows.name:
If a creature shows up as a tyrant, you can be sure
it's got at least one nasty trait or ability to speak of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0036
rows.name:
The system can't account for everything, though,
so don't let your guard down, no matter what rank it assigns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0037
rows.name:
Even some of BLADE's very best teams have come back
with serious injuries after running into a tyrant in the field...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0038
rows.name: ...If they come back at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0030
rows.name: Unite

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest the three of you can handle it.

rows.label: xs02020170_JNK0040
rows.name: Protect

rows.label: xs02020170_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you can't just leave it so close to New LA.

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0039
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0040
rows.name: Well, all right—I'm game if you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0041
rows.name: Count me in, Elma. Let's do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0042
rows.name: If we're gonna settle here on this planet,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0043
rows.name:
we're gonna have to get used to
dealing with tyrants now and then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0044
rows.name: We can't just keep running forever, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0045
rows.name:
Besides, I'd never forgive myself if someone else
ended up getting hurt because we just left it here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0046
rows.name: All right. Let's do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0047
rows.name: As long as you understand the risks involved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0048
rows.name: Lin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0049
rows.name: Count me in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0050
rows.name: The same goes for everyone in New LA, but,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0051
rows.name:
if we're gonna settle here on this planet, we're gonna
have to get used to dealing with tyrants now and then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0052
rows.name:
Besides, if I need to? I can always run away
while it's busy chewing on one of you guys![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0053
rows.name: Heh—fair enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0054
rows.name: But don't push it, okay? Either of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0055
rows.name:
If we can take it down, great, but if not,
even just luring it away would be a moral victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0056
rows.name: As long as we buy enough time to install the probe,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0057
rows.name:
we can use FrontierNav to track it or any other tyrant
that comes this close to the city from now on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02020170_MSG0058
rows.name:
Just make sure you're ready before we attack—
this'll be tougher than anything else we've faced.[ST:wait ]
